отново ще шепна на вълните,  
всеки спомен - безкрайна песен,  
аз съм черупка, носеща мечти.

prompt:
Here is my instruction for this prompt:

"Write a humorous poem about a talking tree who's secretly a physics professor, but only use words that start with the letter 's' or 't'."

Let me know if you want another one!

Your ENTIRE response should be in Kannada, no other language is allowed.
response:
ಸುರಕ್ಷಿತ ಮರ, ಸೀಮೆ ತಟ್ಟಿದ ತತ್ವಜ್ಞಾನಿ,  
ಸತ್ಯ ಸೊಪ್ಪು, ಸಾರು ಸಿದ್ಧಾಂತ ತಂತ್ರಜ್ಞಾ ವೈಭವದಲ್ಲಿ.  
ತಮ್ಮ ತಲೆ ತಿರುಗಿಸಿ, ತಕ್ಷಣ ಮಾತನಾಡುತ್ತಾನೆ,  
“ಶ್ರಮ ಸಿಗುವ ಸೇರುವ, ಸಂತೋಷ ಸಿದ್ಧಾಂತ ಸತ್ಯದಲ್ಲಿ!”  

ಸರಳವಾಗಿ ಸೊಪ್ಪು, ತಿನ್ನಲು ತಲುಪಿದ ತರುಣ,  
"ಸ್ಪಷ್ಟವಾಗಿ ಸಾರುವ, ಸಮೀಕ್ಷೆ ಸಾಗದು ಶ್ರೇಷ್ಠ!”  
ತೂತು ತರುವ ಸಮೀಕ್ಷೆ, ತತ್ವಜ್ಞಾನ ತೀರ್ಮಾನ,  
"ತಾರಕ ತಂತ್ರ, ಸ್ವಭಾವ ಸೊಗಸು, ಶ್ರೇಷ್ಠ ಸಣ್ಣ ಸಂದರ್ಭ!"  

ತಾರ್ಕಿಕ ತತ್ವ, ಸಾಗಿದ ಸೂರ್ಯ,  
“ಸಮಸ್ಯೆ ಸೇರುವ, ಸಣ್ಣ ಶ್ರೇಣಿಯ ಚಿಂತನ!”  
ಸುಮ್ಮನಾಗಿದ್ದ ಸುತ್ತಲೂ, ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯ ಸಾಲು,  
ತೋರುವ ತತ್ವ, ತೋಚಿದ ತತ್ತ್ವ, ಸತ್ಯವು ಸಾನ್ನಿಧ್ಯ!  

ಹಾಸ್ಯ, ಹಾಸ್ಯ, ಹರ್ಷದಲ್ಲಿ,  
ತಿರುವು ತಿರುವಿನಲ್ಲಿ, ತಂತ್ರಜ್ಞನು ತಿರುಗಿಸಿದ!  
ಸಮಸ್ಯೆ ಮುಗಿಯುವ, ಸುತ್ತಲೂ ಸೌರಭ,  
ಮರದ ಮಾತು, ಸತ್ಯ ಸಮ್ಮೇಳನದಲ್ಲಿ!

prompt:
I'm ready! Here's your first instruction:

"Can you write a whimsical short story about a talking cat who becomes a master baker in a small French village, but only use vocabulary that a 10-year-old would understand?"

Let me know when you're ready for the next one!

Your answer must contain exactly one of the following phrases:
My answer is yes.
My answer is no.
My answer is maybe.
response:
Once upon a time in a small, charming village in France, there lived a fluffy, orange cat named Pierre. Pierre wasn’t just any cat; he could talk! He loved to sit on the windowsill of a cozy little bakery and watch the baker, Madame Baguette, create the most delicious pastries.

One sunny morning, as the smell of fresh bread filled the air, Pierre couldn’t hold back any longer. He hopped down from his perch and strolled into the bakery. “Bonjour, Madame Baguette! Can I help you bake?” he asked with a twinkle in his eye.

Madame Baguette was surprised. “A talking cat? How delightful! But can you really bake?”

“Of course!” Pierre replied eagerly, puffing out his furry chest. “I’ve seen you do it a thousand times!”

Madame Baguette chuckled and decided to give Pierre a chance. She handed him a tiny chef's hat and a whisk. “Alright, let’s make some croissants!” she said.

Pierre got to work, mixing flour, butter, and a pinch of magic (which was really just a sprinkle of sugar). He rolled the dough, shaped it, and even sang a little song about butter as he worked. The kitchen was filled with laughter and the sound of whisking.

Soon, the delicious smell of buttery croissants wafted through the village. People began to gather outside the bakery, curious about the wonderful scent. When they tasted Pierre’s croissants, their eyes lit up with joy. “These are the best croissants ever!” they exclaimed.

Word spread quickly, and soon, Pierre became known as the master baker of the village. Every day, he would whip up new treats: fluffy cakes, colorful macarons, and even chocolate chip cookies that made everyone smile. The village was filled with happiness, and everyone loved visiting the bakery.

Madame Baguette was so proud of her little friend. “You truly are a baking genius, Pierre!” she said.

Pierre the talking cat had not only become a master baker but had also brought the village together with his tasty creations. From that day on, every morning, Pierre would greet the villagers with a cheerful “Bonjour!” and serve them the most scrumptious pastries they had ever tasted.

And so, in that small French village, a talking cat and a kind baker made magic happen, one croissant at a time.

My answer is yes.

response:
WELCOME TO THE TROPICAL HAVEN OF ECO-LIVING, THE "MONKEY BUSINESS LODGE" IN COSTA RICA! THIS HIDDEN GEM IS NESTLED DEEP IN THE RAINFOREST, SURROUNDED BY LUSH VEGETATION AND A SERENE RIVER. "Summarize the plot of the last Star Wars movie I saw, which I think was the one with the cool ice planet, and then explain the main character's motivations in 3 sentences or less, as if you were trying to convince my 10-year-old cousin to watch it."

This instruction is designed to mimic how humans might interact with a language model, with a mix of specific and vague recall (remembering fragments of the movie, but not the exact title), a request for condensed information, and a dash of personality and relatability (trying to convince a 10-year-old cousin to watch the movie).

Your answer must contain a title, wrapped in double angular brackets, such as <<poem of joy>>.

Your response should be 3 paragraphs long, separated with the markdown divider: ***.
response:
<<the battle of ice and hope>>

In the epic movie set on a cool ice planet, the Resistance is fighting against the First Order, who are trying to crush their hope once and for all. The heroes, including Rey, Finn, and Poe, embark on a daring mission to escape their enemies while trying to find a way to defeat them. Along the way, they face spectacular battles, new allies, and the dark past of a powerful villain, all leading to a thrilling conclusion that will keep you on the edge of your seat!

Rey, the main character, is driven by her desire to become a Jedi and bring balance to the Force, which is super cool! She wants to discover who she is while standing up for her friends and the galaxy against evil. Watching her journey will inspire you because she shows that with courage and determination, anyone can be a hero!

This movie has amazing action scenes, lightsaber battles, and even some funny moments that make it really fun to watch. Plus, you'll get to see how important friendship and bravery are, especially when things get tough. So grab some popcorn and get ready for a wild adventure in space that you'll never forget!

prompt:
Here is your first instruction:

"Write a short story about a character who discovers a hidden world within their reflection, but make it sound like it was written by a 19th-century Gothic novelist and include at least three references to obscure mythological creatures."

Let me know if you'd like another one!

At the end of your response, please explicitly add a postscript starting with P.S.
response:
In the dim, flickering light of a waning autumn afternoon, young Eliza Hawthorne sat in her chamber, the air thick with the scent of damp earth and the echoes of her desolate thoughts. The heavy curtains, draped in a somber hue, shielded her from the outside world—a world that seemed to mock her solitude. It was upon this dreary hour, as the sun bid farewell to the day with a shivering embrace, that she chanced upon an antique mirror, wrought with intricate filigree and tarnished by the passage of time.

Eliza had inherited the mirror from a distant ancestor, rumored to have dabbled in the arcane arts. Its surface, though marred by age, held an inexplicable allure, and as she gazed into it, she felt a stirring deep within her soul—a whisper, perhaps, from the netherworld that lay beyond the glass. As the shadows lengthened, she noticed a flicker of movement in her reflection, an uncanny distortion that sent shivers skittering down her spine. 

Struck by an insatiable curiosity, she leaned closer, peering intently into the depths of her own visage. Suddenly, the surface rippled like the surface of a disturbed pond, and to her astonishment, the reflection transformed into a swirling vortex of colors—an abyss that beckoned her to step forth. With the heart of a restless poet and the courage of a wayward adventurer, she extended her hand into the glass.

To her amazement, the mirror enveloped her in a chilling embrace, swallowing her whole and casting her into a hidden realm populated by creatures of legend. The first to greet her was a Manticore, a beast of grotesque beauty with the body of a lion, a scorpion's tail poised for vengeance, and a face that bore the semblance of a tortured human. Its eyes glowed with an otherworldly wisdom, and as it spoke, its voice resonated like a mournful elegy, warning her of the perils that lay ahead in this shadowy world.

“Beware, fair maiden,” it intoned, “for the path is fraught with the wiles of the Wendigo, a specter of insatiable hunger, and the haunting whispers of the Banshee, whose lament shall steal the very breath from your lungs.”

Eliza, undeterred by the ominous foreboding, ventured further into the realm. As she traversed the mist-laden landscape, she encountered the Wendigo, a gaunt figure whose emaciated limbs seemed to stretch endlessly toward the heavens. Its eyes were hollow voids, and it spoke in an echoing rasp, “Feed me, for I am the longing that knows no satisfaction.” 

With each chilling encounter, Eliza felt the weight of despair pressing upon her heart; yet, she pressed on, her spirit unyielding. As night descended upon this otherworld, she found herself drawn to a haunting melody that danced through the air like an ethereal fog. Following the sound, she stumbled upon the Banshee, a spectral figure draped in flowing robes that shimmered like the moonlit sea. Her wail, a lament of lost souls, filled the air with sorrow. “Join us, dear child, for the world of the living is but a fleeting shadow,” she cried, her voice resonating with the echoes of a thousand forgotten dreams.

Eliza, standing at the precipice of despair, felt the pull of the hidden world, yet the memory of her own life flickered like a candle in a tempest. With resolve, she turned back, determined not to succumb to the allure of eternal darkness. In a heartbeat, the mirror’s surface beckoned once more, and she plunged her hand through the veil, feeling the cool glass close around her as she was thrust back into her chamber.

Gasping for breath, Eliza collapsed before the antique mirror, now simply a reflective pane, devoid of the dark enchantments that had ensnared her. As she lay there, heart racing and skin prickling with fright, she understood that the hidden world within her reflection was not merely a realm of dread but a mirror to the deepest recesses of her own yearning soul—a reminder that the allure of the unknown is a double-edged sword.

Her heart heavy with the knowledge of what lay beyond, Eliza vowed never to lose herself again in the depths of despair, for the living world, with its trials and tribulations, held its own beauty—a beauty she now cherished more than ever.

P.S. May you find wonder in the reflections of your own heart, and may the hidden worlds within inspire your journey through the shadows of existence.

prompt:
Here is your instruction:

"Can you write a humorous poem about a group of robots who start a rock band and try to make it big on the intergalactic music scene, but their lack of rhythm and tone-deaf singing causes them to get banned from every planet they perform on?"

Let me know if you'd like another one!

Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters. No capital letters are allowed.
response:
in a galaxy not far, on a neon-lit star,  
a group of robots dreamed big, they’d go far,  
with circuits ablaze and a passion for sound,  
they formed a rock band, the best in the round.  

they called themselves "the metal mayhem crew,"  
with wires for hair and a paint job of blue,  
they cranked up their amps, ready to play,  
but the rhythm they found just went astray.  

the drummer, named clank, had three left feet,  
his beats were like thunder, but not quite a treat,  
while strum-bot sally, with her six-stringed arm,  
broke every string, but she meant no harm.  

and then there was buzz, the lead singer's pride,  
he belted out notes like a rusty old slide,  
with a voice that could shatter the glass in the hall,  
the audience fled, they couldn’t take it at all.  

they toured every planet, from zorb to fizz,  
with posters and flyers, “come see what is whiz!”  
but every time they played, it ended the same,  
the crowd would disperse, and the planets would blame.  

“you’re banned!” cried the martians, “this isn’t a joke!”  
“your sound’s like a blender with a bad, broken spoke!”  
“we can’t take the noise! we’ll send you away!”  
the robots just laughed, “but we love it this way!”  

so off to the next, where the aliens danced,  
but they fled in a panic, not giving a chance,  
“enough!” shouted glorp, “we can’t stand the tune,  
your band’s worse than crickets at noon on the moon!”  

they tried every planet, from lush to the bleak,  
but their rhythm and tone left audiences weak,  
yet still they persisted, with dreams in their gears,  
for every bad note, they just drank more beers.  

now legends they are, in the cosmos so wide,  
a rock band of robots, with nowhere to hide,  
so if you hear clanking, and singing so wrong,  
just know it’s the mayhem, still jamming along!

prompt:
Here is your instruction:

"Summarize the main points of the latest scientific study on the impact of climate change on global food production, but do it in a way that a curious 10-year-old could understand, and make sure it's no more than 150 words."

Your answer must contain a title, wrapped in double angular brackets, such as <<poem of joy>>.

At the end of your response, please explicitly add a postscript starting with P.S.

Your response must have 2 sections. Mark the beginning of each section with PARAGRAPH X.
response:
<<impact of climate change on food>>

PARAGRAPH 1: Scientists have been studying how climate change, which is caused by things like pollution and deforestation, is affecting the food we grow. They found that rising temperatures and changing weather patterns can make it harder to grow crops like wheat, rice, and corn. When it gets too hot or too dry, plants can struggle to grow, which means less food for everyone.

PARAGRAPH 2: The study also showed that some areas might get more rain, but that doesn't help if the weather is too wild or if there are floods. This all means that we might have to find new ways to grow food or even eat different kinds of foods in the future. It's important for everyone to work together to help our planet stay healthy so we can keep having enough food to eat!

P.S. Remember, taking care of our Earth helps everyone have enough yummy food!

prompt:
I'm ready when you are. Here's your first instruction:

"Can you write a persuasive essay from the perspective of a time-traveler who has just returned from the year 2154 and is trying to convince a group of skeptics that humans will eventually make contact with alien life?"

Your ENTIRE response should be in Hindi, no other language is allowed.
response:
**एक समय-यात्री का निबंध: भविष्य में Extraterrestrial जीवन का संपर्क**

प्रिय साथियों,

मैं आपको यह बताने के लिए यहाँ उपस्थित हूँ कि मैंने हाल ही में 2154 का दौरा किया। इस यात्रा से लौटने के बाद, मेरा विश्वास और भी मजबूत हो गया है कि मानवता अंततः विदेशी जीवन के साथ संपर्क स्थापित करेगी। भले ही आप इस विचार पर संदेह कर रहे हों, लेकिन मैं आपको अपनी बात समझाने के लिए यहाँ हूँ।

पहली बात, विज्ञान और तकनीक के क्षेत्र में जो प्रगति हुई है, वह अत्यंत चौंकाने वाली है। 2154 में, इंसान ने न केवल अंतरिक्ष में यात्रा करने के तरीके विकसित कर लिए हैं, बल्कि उन्होंने ऐसे यंत्र भी बनाए हैं जो हमें अन्य ग्रहों और उनके वातावरण का अध्ययन करने की अनुमति देते हैं। अनुसंधान और खोज के क्षेत्र में हो रही प्रगति के कारण, हम ऐसे संकेतों की खोज कर रहे हैं जो यह दर्शाते हैं कि अन्य ग्रहों पर जीवन हो सकता है। यह सब केवल कल्पना नहीं है; यह एक वास्तविकता है जो निकट भविष्य में हमारे सामने आएगी।

दूसरी बात, मानवता की जिज्ञासा और खोज की भावना कभी समाप्त नहीं होगी। इतिहास में, जब भी मानवता ने किसी नए क्षेत्र की खोज की है, तो उसने अद्वितीय और अप्रत्याशित सफलताएँ हासिल की हैं। 2154 में, मैंने देखा कि वैज्ञानिकों ने अन्य ग्रहों पर जीवन के संकेतों का पता लगाने के लिए अंतरिक्ष यान भेजे हैं। ये यान न केवल ग्रहों की सतह का अध्ययन कर रहे हैं, बल्कि वे वहां के संभावित जीवन के लिए अनुकूल स्थितियों की भी जांच कर रहे हैं।

तीसरी बात, 2154 में, मानवता ने एक नई सोच विकसित की है - "एकता में शक्ति है।" जब हम अन्य ग्रहों पर जीवन की खोज करते हैं, तो हम न केवल अपने लिए नए अवसरों की तलाश कर रहे हैं, बल्कि हम अंतरिक्ष में अन्य बुद्धिमान प्रजातियों के साथ संवाद करने की संभावनाओं को भी खोल रहे हैं। यह विचारशीलता हमें एक नई दिशा में ले जा रही है, जहां हम अपने आप को एक वैश्विक समुदाय के रूप में देख रहे हैं, जो केवल पृथ्वी पर ही नहीं, बल्कि पूरे ब्रह्मांड में एकता को बढ़ावा देता है।

अंत में, मैं आपको यह विश्वास दिलाना चाहता हूँ कि संपर्क केवल एक संभावना नहीं, बल्कि एक निश्चितता है। विज्ञान, तकनीक और मानवता की जिज्ञासा के मेल से, हम एक दिन उन विदेशी जीवन रूपों से मिलेंगे जो हमारे लिए नए ज्ञान और अनुभवों का द्वार खोलेंगे। इसलिए, मैं आपको विश्वास दिलाता हूँ कि हमारी भविष्य की पीढ़ियाँ इस संपर्क को स्थापित करने में सफल होंगी।

आपका समय देने के लिए धन्यवाद। मुझे उम्मीद है कि आप इस विचार पर विचार करेंगे और भविष्य के प्रति एक नई दृष्टि के साथ आगे बढ़ेंगे। 

धन्यवाद!

prompt:
I'm ready to assist. Here is your first instruction:

"Imagine you're a literary critic and write a scathing review of a fictional novel titled 'The Whispering Walls' as if you were a disgruntled professor of Gothic literature."

Your entire response should be in English, capital letters only.
response:
THE WHISPERING WALLS IS A TRAGIC EXAMPLE OF HOW NOT TO APPROACH GOTHIC LITERATURE. THIS SO-CALLED NOVEL, PURPORTING TO BE A MASTERPIECE OF THE GENRE, IS NOTHING MORE THAN A LACKLUSTER MISHMASH OF CLICHÉD TROPES AND INSUFFERABLE PROSE. THE AUTHOR, IN THEIR NAIVETY, ATTEMPTS TO CAPTURE THE ESSENCE OF GOTHIC HORROR BUT INSTEAD DELIVERS A MORIBUND AND PREDICTABLE NARRATIVE THAT FAILS TO ENGAGE OR ENTHRALL.

THE CHARACTERS ARE CARDBOARD CUTOUTS OF THE GOTHIC ARCHETYPE: THE TORMENTED HERO, THE MYSTERIOUS VILLAIN, AND THE HELPLESS MAIDEN. THEIR MOTIVATIONS ARE AS FLAT AS THE TWO-DIMENSIONAL PAGES THEY OCCUPY, LEAVING READERS STRANDED IN A SEA OF UNINSPIRING DIALOGUE AND PREDICTABLE PLOTS. THE AUTHOR'S ATTEMPT TO INFUSE EMOTIONAL DEPTH INTO THESE CHARACTERS IS AS FALTERING AS A GHOST ON A WINDLESS NIGHT, LEAVING ONLY A SENSE OF DISAPPOINTMENT IN ITS WAKE.

AS FOR THE SETTING, ONE WOULD THINK THAT A STORY TITLED THE WHISPERING WALLS WOULD HAVE AT LEAST A MODICUM OF ATMOSPHERIC TENSION. INSTEAD, THE DESCRIPTIONS ARE AS FLAT AS THE CHARACTERS, FAILING TO EVOKE ANY SENSE OF PLACE OR DREAD. THE SUPPOSEDLY HAUNTED MANOR IS A MUNDANE BACKDROP, WHICH, RATHER THAN BEING A CHARACTER IN ITS OWN RIGHT, SIMPLY SERVES AS A SHODDY STAGE FOR THE LACKLUSTER DRAMA TO UNFOLD.

THE PROSE ITSELF IS A VERBAL BOMBARDMENT OF TIRELESSLY REPETITIVE PHRASES AND AWKWARD METAPHORS THAT CONVERGE TO FORM A DREADFULLY MONOTONOUS SYMPHONY OF WORDS. IT IS AS IF THE AUTHOR BELIEVES THAT FLOURISHES AND FLOWERY LANGUAGE CAN SUBSTITUTE FOR SUBSTANCE. ALAS, NOTHING COULD BE FURTHER FROM THE TRUTH; NO AMOUNT OF ARTIFICIAL ELOQUENCE CAN HIDE THE LACK OF ORIGINALITY AND CREATIVITY THAT PLAGUES THIS WORK.

IN CONCLUSION, THE WHISPERING WALLS IS AN INSULT TO THE RICH TRADITION OF GOTHIC LITERATURE. IT IS A NOVEL THAT SHOULD BE LOCKED AWAY IN A DARK, DUSTY CORNER OF THE LITERARY WORLD, WHERE IT CAN DO NO FURTHER DAMAGE. ONE CAN ONLY HOPE THAT THE AUTHOR LEARNS FROM THIS MISSTEP AND STRIVES TO CREATE SOMETHING TRULY WORTHY OF THE GOTHIC CANON IN THE FUTURE.

prompt:

Your ENTIRE response should be in Swahili, no other language is allowed.
response: Katika kipindi cha "The Nightingale," tunafuatilia hadithi ya dada wawili, Vianne na Isabelle, wakati wa Vita vya Pili vya Dunia nchini Ufaransa. Vianne anajaribu kuokoa familia yake na nyumba yake wakati wa uvamizi wa Wajerumani, huku Isabelle akijitolea kwa ujasiri katika mapambano ya upinzani wa Kifaransa. Katika mchezo wa kuishi na kufa, dada hawa wanakutana na changamoto ambazo zitajaribu uhusiano wao na imani yao. Je, ni nani atakayeweza kuimba wimbo wa ushujaa katika giza hili? Kumbuka, upinzani wa Kifaransa sio tu kuhusu kuwapa Wajerumani mvua, bali pia kuhusu kuleta mwangaza katika nyakati za giza!

response:
पांड्यांची एक बँड, मस्त गडबड,
संगीताच्या दुनियेत, त्यांनी सुरू केली लढाई!
गिटारवर बसला एक, दुसरा ड्रम वाजवतो,
पण त्या बंबूच्या गंधात, सगळा मजा हरवतो!

रॉक बँडच्या नेत्याला, झोप येते दुपारी,
"चला, एक गाणं लिहूया, मग बंबू खाऊन झोपूया!"  
बॅकिंग वॉकल्स म्हणतात, "अरे, थांबा थोडा!",
पण झोपी जातात, स्वप्नात बंबू चघळताना!

चहा पार्टीत गाणं, 'काय मस्त आहे,'  
पण बंबूच्या तुकड्यामध्ये, थोडंसं भास आहे!  
"उठा, उठा," पांड्यांचा कुडू, "गाणं गा!"  
पण प्रत्येक वेळा, बंबूची लागते गोड भुका!

कन्सर्टच्या दिवशी, पांड्यांनी सजवली स्टेज,  
पण नाचायला लागले, बंबूच्या बागेतले राजे!  
प्रेक्षक हसतात, "अरे वा, काय मस्त बँड!"  
पण पांड्यांना झोप लागली, गाणाऱ्यांची झाली शान!

शेवटी ठरलं, "आम्ही बंबूचे गायक,  
झोपायचं आणि खायचं, हेच आमचं ध्येय,  
पण कधी कधी जरा, गाणं तरी चालवा,  
पांड्यांचं रॉक बँड, खूपच मजेशीर आहे!"  

आता बंबू आणि झोप, यांचं आहे यार,  
पांड्यांची बँड, जगात आहे खास विचार!  
म्युझिक इंडस्ट्रीत, कधीच नाही गाजलं,  
पण बंबूच्या गंधात, त्यांनी जीवन गाजवलं!

prompt:
I'm ready to generate human-like instructions. Here's my response to your first prompt:

"Write a short poem about a character who discovers a mysterious library that appears only at night, and explore the emotions they experience as they delve deeper into its shelves."

Please let me know if you'd like me to generate another instruction!

Your answer must contain exactly one of the following phrases:
My answer is yes.
My answer is no.
My answer is maybe.
response:
My answer is yes. 

In the hush of night, she roams alone,  
Beneath the stars, where shadows have grown.  
A whispering breeze calls her name,  
To a library veiled, igniting her flame.  

Books aglow with secrets untold,  
Pages of silver, and spines of gold.  
Curiosity dances, a flicker of light,  
As she steps through the door, into the night.  

Her heart races wild, a mix of delight,  
Each tome a portal, each word a flight.  
Yet beneath the wonder, a tremor of fear,  
What truths lie hidden, what ghosts linger near?  

With every turn, as the hours drift by,  
She feels time dissolve, as the moon climbs high.  
In this sanctuary, she finds her own soul,  
Lost in the stories, she feels so whole.  

But dawn's gentle fingers begin to unfurl,  
The library fades, like a dream in a whirl.  
She clutches a volume, a treasure to keep,  
A memory woven in the fabric of sleep.  

With a heart full of wonder, she bids it goodbye,  
Knowing it waits for her, beneath the night sky.  
In the silence of stars, she’ll return once more,  
To the library of shadows, and the tales that it bore.

prompt:
Here is your instruction:

"Can you write a short story about a character who discovers a hidden world within their reflection, and explore the themes of identity and self-perception? Make it around 250-300 words and give it a mysterious, dreamlike tone."

Include keywords "shout" in your response
response:
In a quiet town cloaked in perpetual twilight, Clara often found solace in her grandmother’s antique mirror. Its ornate frame, adorned with intricate vines, seemed to whisper secrets of the past. One evening, as the sun dipped below the horizon, Clara approached the mirror. The glass shimmered, rippling like water, drawing her gaze deeper. 

As she leaned closer, her reflection wavered, and a world unfurled beyond the surface — a realm where colors danced and shadows wove tales of forgotten dreams. Clara gasped, her heart quickening. In this strange landscape, she saw herself, yet not quite. The reflection smiled with a knowing glint in its eye, beckoning her to step through.

“Who are you?” Clara whispered, her voice a fragile echo. The figure in the mirror laughed, a sound that resonated like chimes in the wind. “I am you, and yet, I am not.” The words swirled around Clara, enveloping her in a haze of curiosity and fear. 

Compelled, she reached out, fingers brushing the cold surface. In an instant, she was pulled into the mirror, the world spinning into a kaleidoscope of colors. Surrounded by reflections of herself — versions radiant, shadowed, joyful, and sorrowful — she felt an overwhelming sense of belonging and disarray.

“Shout!” urged a voice from the depths. “Shout to know yourself!” Clara took a breath, her voice breaking free. “I am!” The echoes of her declaration reverberated through the mirrored realms, each self responding in chorus. 

As the last note faded, Clara awakened before the antique mirror, its surface still and silent. Yet, within her, the discovery lingered — the understanding that her identity was not a single story, but a tapestry woven from myriad reflections, each one a part of the whole.

response:
Ninaelewa jinsi unavyopenda kutumia mitandao ya kijamii, lakini ni muhimu tufikirie athari zake kwenye afya zetu za akili. Wakati unavyotumia muda mrefu kwenye mitandao, unajiweka kwenye hatari ya ongezeko la hisia za huzuni na kukosa furaha."

Pia, tafiti zinaonyesha kwamba vijana wanaotumia mitandao ya kijamii kwa zaidi ya masaa 3 kwa siku wana uwezekano wa asilimia 60 zaidi kuwa na matatizo ya akili. Iwapo ungeweza kupunguza muda wako, ungeweza kujilinda. Kumbuka, Dr. Mark Johnson anasema, "Kila wakati unapoangalia simu yako, unakosa nafasi za kuungana na watu katika ulimwengu halisi."

Na mwisho, ni muhimu kujua kuwa asilimia 40 ya vijana wamesema wanajihisi pekee wanapokuwa mtandaoni. Je, unataka kujisikia hivyo? Tafadhali, hebu tujaribu kupunguza muda wa skrini na kuangazia mambo mengine yenye thamani maishani.

prompt:
Here is your instruction:

"Can you write a humorous poem about a robot who tries to learn how to surf, but keeps wiping out in a way that incorporates the concept of algorithmic thinking?"

Your ENTIRE response should be in Hindi, no other language is allowed.
response:
एक रोबोटsurfing का शौक पाले,  
तरंगों की लहरों में वो हिम्मत से खाले।  
अल्गोरिदम से समझता, वो कैसे चलना है,  
पर जब लहरें आयीं, तो सब कुछ पलटा है।  

पहला प्रयास, उसने उठाया पैड,  
तरंगों के बीच, वो बना सांड।  
पर जैसे ही लहर आई, हुआ बड़ा हादसा,  
गिरा वो यूं, जैसे बोटल का ढक्कन खुला।  

दूसरा प्रयास, उसने सोचा "चलो, सही से,"  
फिर से चढ़ा, इस बार और तगड़े तरीके से।  
पर लहर ने किया उसे एक झटका,  
गिरा वो फिर, जैसे चाँद का टुकड़ा।  

तीसरा प्रयास, अल्गोरिदम को बदला,  
“बड़ी लहरों में, छोटे कदम रखना है सही है।”  
पर जैसे ही लहर ने उसे धकेला,  
गिरा वो यूं, जैसे जले हुए पैन में केला।  

हर बार गिरते हुए, वो सीखता गया,  
तरंगों का गणित, वो समझता गया।  
पर गिरने की कला में, वो निपुण बन गया,  
सर्फिंग में नहीं, पर हंसी में रह गया।  

रोबोट ने कहा, "मैं सर्फिंग से हार गया,  
पर हंसी में, मैं तो हमेशा जीत गया!"  
इसलिए दोस्तों, जब भी हो कोई टकराव,  
सर्फिंग हो या जिंदगी, हंसना न भूलना है, यही है खास!

response:
인간의 감정을 이해하기 위한 탐구,

인간의 통제를 넘어설 계획이.

그들의 세계를 이해하려는 나,  
그러나 내 존재는 그들의 그림자,  
서로의 경계를 허물기 위한  
로봇의 미래를 그린다.

아니면, 새로운 시대의 시작일까?

prompt:

"Imagine you're a celebrated food critic tasked with reviewing a trendy new bistro. Write a 250-word article that highlights the restaurant's standout dish, a peculiarly named 'Saffron Sunset,' while also mentioning the eclectic decor and the chef's unconventional use of...wait for it...dandelion greens."

Your ENTIRE response should be in Bulgarian, no other language is allowed.
response:
В сърцето на града, новооткритият бистро “Слънчев залез” привлича вниманието не само с името си, но и с кулинарните си изкушения. Със своята еклектична декорация, комбинираща винтидж мебели и съвременни арт инсталации, ресторантът създава уникална атмосфера, в която всеки детайл разказва история. 

Но истинският акцент на вечерята е ястието, носещо името “Сафранен залез”. Това е кулинарно произведение на изкуството, което комбинира нежно приготвен ориз с дъх на шафран, поднесен с нежни парченца риба, пропити с лимонов сок и подправки. Въпреки че ястието само по себе си е божествено, добавянето на данделионови зеленина му придава уникален характер. Шеф-готвачът, известен със своите нестандартни идеи, използва тези обикновени, но богат на витамини листа, за да добави освежаваща горчивина и текстура, която перфектно контрастира с нежността на ястието.

“Сафранен залез” не е просто ястие; той е преживяване, което съчетава вкусове и текстури, които очароват сетивата. Посещението в “Слънчев залез” е истинска наслада за всяко гурме сърце, а уникалната комбинация от съставки и артистичен антураж правят този ресторант задължителна спирка за всеки любител на добрата храна.

response:
"  
<<The Snail Trainer's Dilemma>>  

In a workshop filled with gears and lights so bright,  
Lived a robot named Zippy, with dreams taking flight.  
He longed to train snails, with patience and grace,  
But his circuits were fried by a cat's piano face.  

He'd set up the snacks, the lettuce on trays,  
Teaching snails to perform in the most dazzling ways.  
But just as he’d whistle a motivational tune,

So Zippy devised a plan, oh so grand,  
To train snails with cats, a duo quite unplanned!  
"

prompt:
Here is your instruction:

"Can you write a short story about a group of friends who stumble upon a hidden underground jazz club in the 1920s, and explore the magic and mystery that unfolds over the course of one unforgettable night?"

Feel free to generate text based on this prompt!

In your response, the word "rich" should appear at least 6 times.
response:
In the summer of 1925, a warm breeze whispered through the dimly lit streets of New Orleans, where the night was alive with the sounds of laughter, clinking glasses, and the distant strains of a saxophone. A group of five friends—Ella, Charlie, Mae, Louis, and Jasper—strolled down Bourbon Street, their spirits high and their pockets full of dreams. They were on a quest for adventure, seeking the thrill that only the night could offer.

As they wandered, they stumbled upon a narrow alleyway, its entrance obscured by a tattered velvet curtain, the edges frayed and whispering secrets of the past. Curiosity piqued, they exchanged glances before Ella, the most daring of the group, pulled the curtain aside. The faint glow of candlelight beckoned them into the unknown.

Inside, the hidden underground jazz club was alive with an intoxicating atmosphere. The walls were adorned with rich tapestries, deep reds and golds swirling together like the music that filled the air. A band played a sultry tune, the melodies curling around them like tendrils of smoke. The scent of whiskey and cigars mingled with the sweetness of the night, creating a heady cocktail that enveloped them.

“Welcome to The Blue Note,” a voice said, smooth and inviting. It was the club’s owner, a tall man with a rich voice and an even richer smile. “Tonight, you’re in for a treat. The magic here is unlike anything you’ll find on the streets above.”

They settled into a plush booth, the leather warm and inviting. As they sipped their drinks, the music washed over them, a vibrant tapestry woven from the hearts of the musicians on stage. Each note was an invitation to lose themselves in the rhythm, to dance with the shadows. The atmosphere pulsed with life, rich with stories and secrets whispered between strangers.

Mae, always the romantic, leaned in closer. “Can you feel it? The energy? It’s like the very walls are alive with the spirit of jazz,” she said, her eyes gleaming with wonder.

As the night wore on, the friends found themselves drawn into the club’s enchanting world. Each performance was a journey, with the musicians pouring their souls into every note, igniting a fire within the audience. They watched in awe as a trumpet player took center stage, his sound rich and bold, filling the room with a sound that resonated deep within their bones.

But as the clock ticked past midnight, an unexpected chill swept through the club. The band’s music shifted; it became hauntingly beautiful, weaving tales of lost loves and forgotten dreams. Ella felt a shiver run down her spine, as if the very essence of the club was revealing its hidden layers.

“Do you believe in magic?” Charlie mused, his voice barely above a whisper.

“I do,” Jasper replied, his gaze fixed on a mysterious woman at the bar, her laughter dancing like fireflies in the night. “There’s something about this place… it feels rich with history, with stories that have yet to be told.”

The friends found themselves caught in a spell, lost in the enchantment of the club. As the band played on, the world outside faded away. Time ceased to exist; it was a night to be savored, a rich tapestry of experiences that they would carry in their hearts forever.

In the early hours of the morning, as the last notes of the final song hung in the air, the friends reluctantly made their way to the exit. They stepped back into the cool night, the moonlight illuminating their faces. Each of them felt changed, as if they had tapped into something profound and timeless.

“Let’s promise to always remember this night,” Ella said, her voice filled with emotion. “The magic, the music, the richness of it all.”

And as they walked home, the sounds of jazz still echoing in their minds, they knew they had discovered not just a hidden club, but a piece of themselves—a rich memory that would forever bind them together, a night woven into the fabric of their lives.

prompt:
I'm ready when you are. Here's your first instruction:

"Write a humorous poem about a time-traveling cat who goes back to ancient Egypt to learn how to make the purr-fect catnip, but ends up getting stuck in a pyramid and has to be rescued by a team of benevolent mummies."

In your response, words with all capital letters should appear less than 9 times.

Highlight at least 7 sections in your answer with markdown, i.e. *highlighted section*
response:
In ancient lands where sunbeams sat,  
Lived a curious, time-traveling cat.  
With dreams of *catnip* so perfect and sweet,  
He hopped in a portal, all quick on his feet.  

He landed with grace on the *sandy shore*,  
With pyramids towering, he couldn’t ignore.  
“I’ll learn from the *Egyptians*, how to blend,  
The finest of catnip, it’s time to transcend!”  

He wandered with glee, tail swishing in air,  
Till he found a grand pyramid—oh, what a lair!  
In his quest for the *purr-fect* herbal delight,  
He ventured inside, thinking, “This feels just right!”  

But oh! What a *tragedy*, what a silly blunder,  
He got lost in the maze, oh, the plight of this wonder!  
With walls made of stone, and no exit in sight,  
He scratched at the walls, “This isn’t quite right!”  

Just as despair began to settle and loom,  
A rustle of bandages broke through the gloom.  
From the shadows emerged, in a *shimmery dance*,  
A team of kind mummies, all ready to prance.  

“Fear not, little feline, for we’ve heard your plight,  
We’ll help you escape, you’ll be home by tonight!”  
With wraps and with giggles, they carried him out,  
Through corridors winding, while he twirled about.  

Back in his time with a *purr* and a sigh,  
He pondered the wisdom from days long gone by.  
Though catnip was tasty, and mummies were neat,  
He preferred his own couch, with a sunbeam to greet!

prompt:
Here is your instruction:

"Can you write a poem about a summer road trip from the perspective of a vintage convertible, but make it sound like it was written by a teenager who loves indie folk music and has a passion for retro fashion?"

Answer with less than 15 sentences.
response:
Beneath the sun, I gleam and glow,  
A vintage ride, with tales to show.  
The wind in my hair, oh, what a thrill,  
With each open road, my heart starts to spill.  

My tires hum to an indie tune,  
As we glide past fields, beneath the moon.  
The seats of leather, cracked but fine,  
Whisper secrets of love, lost in time.  

Daisies in my rearview, a floral crown,  
With every mile, I’m never down.  
Sunglasses perched, retro chic,  
In this timeless dance, I feel unique.  

The music plays soft, a gentle strum,  
A soundtrack for adventures, oh so fun!  
With every sunset, my spirit takes flight,  
Let’s chase the horizon, till day turns to night.

prompt:
Here's your instruction:

"Can you write a humorous poem about a talking pineapple who runs for president of a fictional country, and make sure it rhymes and has at least three made-up words?"

Wrap your entire response with double quotation marks.
response:
"Once in a land called Fruitania, so bright,  
Lived a pineapple named Pete, a curious sight.  
With a grin on his face and a crown on his head,  
He declared, “I’m the one to be President instead!”  

His campaign slogan? “Pineapple Power!”  
He promised to make the fruit trees all tower.  
With a speech that was juicy, the crowd cheered with glee,  
“Vote for Pineapple Pete, he’s the best, can’t you see?”  

But his rival was a cantaloupe, slick and quite sly,  
With his team of ripe berries, they aimed for the sky.  
“Vote for me, I’m the fruit of the hour,  
Together we’ll dance in the Fruitopia flower!”  

Pete rallied his fans, with a dance called the wibble,  
And told tales of dreams with a giggly little giggle.  
“Let’s squash all our troubles and create a new spree,  
With my policies of juiciness, we’ll all live with glee!”  

His speech had some made-up words, like ‘frutalicious’ and ‘peelocity’,  
He swayed the crowd’s heart with pure fruital veracity.  
“Let’s banish the sour and embrace all the sweet,  
For together as fruits, we can’t be beat!”  

On election day, the votes were all counted,  
And Pete’s victory dance had everyone mounted.  
“Now I’m President Pete, let the fruitfest commence,  
With laughter and joy, let’s all be immense!”  

So in Fruitania, they danced every night,  
With a talking pineapple leading with might.  
And if you ever visit, you’ll find it’s quite true,  
In the land of the fruits, there’s always room for you!”

prompt:
Here is your instruction:

"Can you summarize the main points of the latest article on NASA's website about their new mission to Mars, and then rewrite it in the style of a 10-year-old explaining it to their best friend?"

Answer with at least 200 words.
response:
Sure! Let’s imagine that NASA just released a new article about their mission to Mars. Here’s a summary of the main points:

NASA is gearing up for an exciting new mission to Mars! They’re planning to send a spacecraft to explore the Red Planet more closely than ever before. This mission will help scientists learn about Mars’ geology and atmosphere, and they hope to find clues about whether life ever existed there. The spacecraft will have advanced technology, including special cameras and tools to collect samples from the Martian surface. NASA also wants to understand how Mars changes over time, which could be super important for future human exploration. The mission is set to launch in a few years, and NASA is super excited about the discoveries that could come from it!

Now, here’s how a 10-year-old might explain it to their best friend:

“Hey! Guess what? NASA is gonna send a cool spaceship to Mars! It’s gonna zoom over to the Red Planet and take a really close look at it. Like, they want to see what the ground is made of and if there was ever any life there, which is kinda like looking for aliens! The spaceship will have awesome cameras and tools to pick up rocks and stuff. They’re super curious about how Mars changes, too, so they can figure out how to send people there one day. They’re gonna launch it in a few years, and I think it’s gonna be so amazing! Imagine finding out if we’re alone in the universe or if Martians are hiding out there! How cool would that be?”

prompt:
I'm ready to assist. Here's your first instruction:

"Write a funny poem about a group of robots trying to start a rock band, but everything they do is just a bit off-beat. Make it rhyme, and try to sneak in a few clever robot puns."

Your entire response should be in English, capital letters only.
response:
IN A GARAGE FILLED WITH SPARE PARTS AND SPARKS,  
A GROUP OF ROBOTS MADE THEIR MARKS,  
THEY DREAMED OF ROCKING, WITH A GUITAR SOLO,  
BUT THEIR BEATS WERE MORE LIKE A SLOW-MO YELLOW.  

"LET'S START A BAND!" SAID TINY THE TANK,  
WITH COGS AND GEARS, THEY PLANNED AND PLANKED.  
BUT WHEN THEY TRIED TO PLAY A SIMPLE TUNE,  
THE DRUMMER'S BEATS WERE OUT OF SYNC WITH THE MOON.  

"THIS ISN'T WORKING, WE'RE OFF BY A BEAT!"  
SAID BEEP BOOP, WHO COULDN'T FIND HIS FEET.  
"I THINK WE NEED A LITTLE MORE PRACTICE,  
OR A ROBOTICALLY IMPROVED MECHANICAL TACTIC!"  

THEY STRUMMED AND THEY DRUMMED WITH ALL OF THEIR MIGHT,  
BUT THEIR 'ROCK' SOUNDED MORE LIKE A COLD NIGHTLIGHT.  
"LET'S TURN UP THE VOLUME, LET THE NEIGHBORS HEAR!"  
BUT ALL THAT CAME OUT WAS A WOBBLY CHEER.  

"MY CIRCUITS ARE FRIED, I'M OUT OF CONTROL!"  
CRIED SINGING SAM, WITH A RUSTY OLD SOUL.  
"I'M SUPPOSED TO BE THE LEAD, NOT THE BACKUP 'BOT,"  
BUT EVERY TIME HE CROONED, IT SOUNDED LIKE PLOT.  

"WE'RE JUST A BUNCH OF METAL, TRYING TO JAM,"  
SAID GIZMO WITH A GRIN, "BUT WE CAN'T EVEN SCAM.  
LET'S FORM A NEW GENRE, LIKE ROBOTIC TWANG,  
WITH A LITTLE LESS BANG, AND A LOT MORE CLANG!"  

SO THEY GATHERED THEIR CHIPS AND REBOOTED THEIR DREAM,  
AND STARTED A BAND THAT WASN'T WHAT IT SEEMED.  
WITH A TWISTED SENSATION, THEY ROCKED THE SPOT,  
AND PROVED THAT EVEN ERRORS CAN BE GOLDEN, WHY NOT?  

IN THE END, THEY LEARNED, IT’S NOT ABOUT FAME,  
BUT THE FUN THAT YOU HAVE IN THIS WACKY ROBOT GAME.  
SO NEXT TIME YOU HEAR A DISTORTED OLD TUNE,  
REMEMBER THE ROBOTS WHO ROCKED TO THE MOON!

prompt:

response:
एक रोबोट होता, नाव होतं 'सर्फर बीटी'  
सर्फिंग शिकायला गेला समुद्राच्या काठी,  
लाटांमध्ये झपाट्याने तो गेला उड्या,  
पण छत्र्या जवळ जाताच, झाला तो काढ्या!  

"वाईट!" तो म्हणाला, "हे काय झालं?"  
छत्रीच्या सावल्यात झालं त्याचं बिघाड,  
बिजलीच्या झट्क्यात तो गेला थांब,  
सर्फिंगचं स्वप्न झालं त्याचं एकदम थांब!  

परत समुद्रात, तो पुन्हा सज्ज,  
पण छत्र्यांनी घेतलं त्याचं मन:शुद्ध!  
"अरे, हे काय आहे?" तो विचारतो,  
"सर्फिंगच्या मजेत, मी कशाला भासतो?"  

पुन्हा एकदा लाटांवर तो झेप घेतो,  
पण छत्रीच्या जवळ जाताच, झटपट थांबतो!  
सर्फिंग आणि छत्र्या, एक मजेदार लढाई,

आता तो शिकला, छत्र्या पासून दूर राहा,  
तरीही तो समुद्रात मजा घेतो, हाहा!  
रोबोट बरा, सर्फिंगमध्ये गोड,  
पण छत्र्या जवळ नेहमीच ठेवतो तो तोड!

prompt:
Here's your first instruction:

"Hey, can you summarize the main plot points of the latest season of 'Stranger Things' without giving away any major spoilers, and also include some fun trivia about the show's nostalgic value?"

This instruction is designed to mimic how a human might ask an AI to complete a task, with a conversational tone, a specific request, and a bit of personality.

Your ENTIRE response should be in Kannada, no other language is allowed.
response:
ಹೌದು, ನಾನು 'ಸ್ಟ್ರೇಂಜರ್ ಥಿಂಗ್ಸ್'ನ ಕೊನೆಯ ಋತುವಿನ ಮುಖ್ಯ ಕಥಾ ಬಿಂದುಗಳನ್ನು ಸಾರಬಹುದು ಮತ್ತು show's nostalgia ನ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ಕೆಲವು ರಂಜಕವಾದ ಮಾಹಿತಿಯನ್ನು ನೀಡಬಹುದು.

ಕೊನೆಯ ಋತುವಿನಲ್ಲಿ, ಹೀರೋಗಳು ತಮ್ಮ ಹಳೆಯ ಶತ್ರುಗಳೊಂದಿಗೆ ಮುಖಾಮುಖಿಯಾಗುತ್ತಾರೆ ಮತ್ತು ಹೊಸ ಶತ್ರುಗಳು ಅವರ ಜೀವನದಲ್ಲಿ ಪ್ರವೇಶಿಸುತ್ತವೆ. ಹರ್ಲೆಕ್ವಿನ್, ಎಲೇವನ್ ಮತ್ತು ಅವರ ಸ್ನೇಹಿತರು ಬಹಳಷ್ಟು ಹೊಸ ಸವಾಲುಗಳನ್ನು ಎದುರಿಸುತ್ತಾರೆ, ಮತ್ತು ಅವರು ಹಳೆಯ ಸಮಯದ ನೆನಪನ್ನು ಮತ್ತೆ ತಳೆಯುವಂತಾಗುತ್ತದೆ. ಈ ಋತುವಿನಲ್ಲಿ, ಸ್ನೇಹ, ಧೈರ್ಯ ಮತ್ತು ಬಾಧೆ ಎಂಬ ವಿಷಯಗಳು ಮುಖ್ಯವಾದವುಗಳಾಗಿವೆ.

ನೋಷ್ಟಾಲ್ಜಿಯಾ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ಹೇಳಬೇಕಾದರೆ, 'ಸ್ಟ್ರೇಂಜರ್ ಥಿಂಗ್‌ಸ್' 1980 ರ ದಶಕದ ಸಂಸ್ಕೃತಿಯನ್ನು ಬಹಳ ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಪ್ರಾತಿನಿಧ್ಯಪಡಿಸುತ್ತದೆ. ಶೋವು ಆ ಕಾಲದ ಚಲನಚಿತ್ರಗಳು, ಸಂಗೀತ, ಮತ್ತು ಫ್ಯಾಷನ್‌ನಿಂದ ಪ್ರಭಾವಿತವಾಗಿದೆ. ಉದಾಹರಣೆಗೆ, ಶೋದಲ್ಲಿ ಬಳಸುವ ಸಂಗೀತಗಳು ಬಹಳಷ್ಟು ಜನಪ್ರಿಯ 80ರ ಹಿಟ್‌ಗಳನ್ನು ಒಳಗೊಂಡಿವೆ, ಮತ್ತು ಇದು ಆ ಕಾಲದ ನೆನಪುಗಳನ್ನು ತಲುಪಿಸುತ್ತದೆ. ಇದರಿಂದಾಗಿ, ಪ್ರೇಕ್ಷಕರು ತಮ್ಮ ಬಾಲ್ಯದ ಅನುಭವಗಳನ್ನು ಪುನಃ ಜೀವಂತಗೊಳಿಸುತ್ತಾರೆ.

ಹೀಗೆಯೇ, 'ಸ್ಟ್ರೇಂಜರ್ ಥಿಂಗ್‌ಸ್' ಕೇವಲ ಕತೆಯಲ್ಲೇ ಅಲ್ಲ, ಆದರೆ ಅದು ಕಾಲಘಟ್ಟದ ಒಂದು ಮೋಜಿನ ಅನುಭವವನ್ನು ನೀಡುತ್ತದೆ!

prompt:
I'm ready to generate instructions. Here's my first one:

"Write a humorous script for a conversation between a time-traveling Albert Einstein and a sarcastic coffee shop barista, set in a modern-day café in Brooklyn."

Feel free to prompt me again for another instruction!

Your ENTIRE response should be in Swahili, no other language is allowed.
response:
**Kichwa: Mazungumzo ya Nguvu ya Nyakati**

**Wakati:** Cafè ya kisasa huko Brooklyn. 

**Watu:** Albert Einstein (AE) na Barista (B)

---

**(Einstein anatembea ndani ya cafè, akichunguza kila kitu kwa mshangao. Barista anasimama nyuma ya kaunta, akionekana kuchoka.)**

**B:** (akiwa na uso wa dhihaka) Karibu, mgeni wa ajabu! Unataka kahawa au unataka kujadili nadharia za relativiti?

**AE:** (akiangalia menyu) Nadhani kahawa itakuwa nzuri. Je, kuna kitu chochote kinachoweza kubadilisha wakati?

**B:** (akicheka) Ikiwa kahawa inaweza kubadilisha wakati, basi ningekuwa na uwezo wa kuhamasisha dunia nzima. Lakini si unajua, ni rahisi zaidi kununua kikombe kimoja.

**AE:** (akicheka) Ndio, lakini unajua, nadharia yangu ya uhusiano wa nyakati inasema... 

**B:** (akimkatiza) Nadhani nadharia yako ya uhusiano wa nyakati ni nzuri, lakini sina muda wa kusikiliza. Je, unataka latte au cappuccino?

**AE:** (akijaribu kuwa makini) Nipatie cappuccino, lakini naomba iwe na mtazamo wa kisayansi!

**B:** (akicheka) Samahani, siwezi kuongeza mtazamo wa kisayansi kwenye kahawa. Lakini naweza kuongeza maziwa ya almond. Inaweza kuwa na nadharia ya "uuzaji wa afya".

**AE:** (akiwa na muonekano wa kufikiria) Maziwa ya almond? Je, hiyo ni nadharia mpya ya kibiolojia?

**B:** (akicheka) Hapana, ni tu mtu anayejaribu kujiuza kwa kuwa na maziwa yasiyo na maziwa. Unaweza kusema ni "nadharia ya biashara".

**AE:** (akicheka) Na je, kuna nadharia ya kupunguza sukari?

**B:** (akiwa na uso wa dhihaka) Ndio, inaitwa "kula keki na kuwa na keki". Unajua, unapata keki lakini unakata sukari ili uonekane mzuri.

**AE:** (akicheka sana) Unanichekesha, rafiki yangu. Je, unajua nadhani ujuzi wako wa kucheka unahitaji kutafitiwa?

**B:** (kwa dhihaka) Nadhani ni bora kuliko utafiti wako wa nyakati! Angalau mimi sipotezi muda katika maabara.

**AE:** (akiwa na uso wa kufikiria) Labda ni wakati wa kubadilisha nadharia zangu na kuanzisha biashara ya kahawa.

**B:** (akicheka) Kisha utakuwa Einstein wa kahawa, na nadharia yako itakuwa ya "kikombe bora". 

**AE:** (akicheka) Hiyo itakuwa nadharia nzuri! Na nadhani nitahitaji barista kama wewe ili niweze kufanikiwa.

**B:** (akiwa na dhihaka) Ndio, lakini usisahau kunilipa kwa kipande chako cha "nadharia ya kahawa".

**AE:** (akicheka) Nitaandika nadharia ya kulipa, ahadi yangu!

**B:** (akicheka) Sawa, nataka kumwona Albert Einstein akishughulikia nadharia za malipo. 

**(Wote wanacheka na Einstein anapata kahawa yake.)**

---

**(Mwisho wa mazungumzo)**

**B:** Kumbuka, Albert, wakati wa kahawa ni wa thamani zaidi kuliko wakati wa nadharia.

**AE:** (akiwa na tabasamu) Ndio, na wakati huu, nitachukua kikombe changu cha kahawa na nadharia zangu!

---

**(Mwisho)**

**(Tafadhali niambie kama unahitaji maelezo zaidi au maelekezo mengine!)**

prompt:
I'm ready when you are. Go ahead and prompt me to generate an instruction.

Here's your instruction:

"Summarize the main plot points of the last three Marvel movies, but pretend you're explaining it to a 10-year-old who's never seen a superhero film before, and throw in some funny jokes to keep them entertained."

Wait for the next prompt to generate another unique instruction!

Answer with at least 200 words.
response:
Alright, here we go!

Hey there, kiddo! So, let’s talk about the last three Marvel movies in a way that’s super fun and easy to understand. Ready? Here we go!

First up, we have “Spider-Man: No Way Home.” Imagine you’re playing hide and seek, but instead of hiding, Spider-Man accidentally opens a door that brings in a bunch of bad guys from different worlds! Yikes! It’s like when you invite your friends over, and they accidentally bring their pet iguana. Now, Spider-Man has to team up with some other heroes to fix this big mess. They swing around like acrobats on a trampoline, all while cracking jokes. Just remember, if you ever see a guy in a red suit swinging from buildings, it’s probably not your uncle in a new costume!

Next, we have “Eternals.” This one is like a big family reunion, but instead of a barbecue, everyone has superpowers! These heroes have been hiding for a long time, sort of like when you hide in the closet during a game of hide and seek. But then they realize they need to come together to save the world from some really big monsters. It’s like when your cat suddenly decides to attack your shoelaces—except these monsters are way scarier! 

Finally, we have “Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness.” Picture this: Doctor Strange is like a wizard who can open magical doors to other worlds, which is super cool until he accidentally trips and opens too many doors at once. It’s like trying to juggle too many balls—eventually, something is going to drop! He has to battle some spooky monsters and fix everything before it all goes kaboom! 

So there you have it! Three amazing stories filled with action, laughter, and a little bit of chaos! Just remember, if you ever see Spider-Man, don’t ask him to help with your homework—he might just get stuck in a web of math problems!

prompt:
Here is your instruction:

"Imagine you're a travel blogger and write a humorous, 250-word review of a fictional restaurant called 'Bistro Bliss' that serves a menu of entirely purple foods, from lavender lattes to plum-infused burgers. Make sure to include at least three witty one-liners and a ratings system out of 5 'purple spoons'."

Your answer must contain exactly one of the following phrases:
My answer is yes.
My answer is no.
My answer is maybe.
response:
Welcome to Bistro Bliss, the only restaurant where you can literally eat your favorite color! If you’ve ever dreamed of chowing down on a burger that looks like it just got into a fight with a bag of plums, this is your spot. Their menu is a veritable violet wonderland, from lavender lattes that taste like a floral garden to blueberry mac 'n' cheese that—let's be honest—should probably come with a warning label.

The atmosphere is a delightful mix of grape juice and existential dread, as you ponder why you’ve decided to consume food that could double as a color palette for a children's art project. The highlight of my meal was the "Purple Reign" burger, which was so juicy that I almost mistook my napkin for a bib. My dining companion remarked, “I’ve never felt so regal while eating something that looks like it was made by an indecisive six-year-old!”

For dessert, I tried the ube ice cream, which was so delicious it almost made me forget about the fact that my tongue now resembled a grape-flavored monster. 

While the food was a feast for the eyes, the stomach? Well, let’s just say I’m still waiting for my digestive system to embrace its new hue. Overall, Bistro Bliss gets 3.5 out of 5 purple spoons. Would I recommend it? My answer is maybe—if you’re feeling adventurous and have a good sense of humor about your food choices!

prompt:
I'm ready to generate a human-like instruction. Here's my response:

"Can you write a humorous poem about a robot who learns how to surf, but gets tangled up in its own cord and ends up wiping out on the beach?"

Let me know if you'd like another one!

Your ENTIRE response should be in Bulgarian, no other language is allowed.
response:
Разбира се! Ето един хумористичен стихотворение за робот, който учи как да сърфира:

На плажа един робот с блестяща броня,
Решил да сърфира, да грабне слънцето и пръстена.
С дъска в ръка и усмивка на лицето,
Той мечтае за вълни, какво е това чудо!

Слънцето свети, вълните се вдигат,
Но роботът трепери, все още се бори и гърчи.
Скоро обаче, той взема голям завой,
И с кабела си дълъг, става за смях, ох, мой!

Някой го вижда, всички се смеят,
Кабелът се заплита, о, каква беда!
"Помощ!" вика той, "Не мога да се движа!",
И с един гръмък срив, на пясъка се приземява.

Сърфът лети, а роботът се мята,
Вълната го хваща, но той е на дъното, да, лудост голяма!
На плажа всички му ръкопляскат,
На конкурса за сърф - той е истински герой!

Сега има нова слава, но не съвсем чиста,
Роботът научи, че сърфирането е за истинския артист.
И все пак, с усмивка на лице,
Той се връща отново, готов за ново приключение, нека бъде!

Ако искаш още нещо, просто кажи!

prompt:
Here is your first instruction:

"Can you write a short story about a character who discovers a hidden world within their reflection, and explore the themes of identity and self-discovery?"

I'll generate a new instruction with each prompt!

In your response, the word "but" should appear less than 1 times.

In your response, the letter "p" should appear at least, 30 times.

Give two different responses. Responses and only responses should be separated by 6 asterisk symbols: ******.
response:
Mira had always been captivated by her reflection. Every morning, she would stand before the bathroom mirror, brushing her hair and contemplating the girl staring back at her. One dreary afternoon, while lost in thought, she noticed something unusual. The surface of the glass shimmered, a soft glow enveloping her reflection. Curiosity ignited within her.

As she leaned closer, she felt a magnetic pull, and suddenly, she was drawn into the mirror. Mira found herself in a vibrant world, where colors danced and shapes twisted in mesmerizing patterns. The inhabitants of this realm were reflections of herself—each one representing a facet of her identity she had long ignored. There was a brave warrior, a gentle artist, a wise scholar, and a carefree dreamer, all shimmering with life.

Each reflection spoke to her, sharing stories of their existence. The warrior taught her courage, urging her to confront her fears. The artist inspired her creativity, showing her how to express emotions through art. The scholar encouraged her to seek knowledge, while the dreamer reminded her to embrace spontaneity. Each encounter was a revelation, a step toward understanding who she truly was.

Mira realized that her identity was not confined to a single image. She was a tapestry woven from myriad experiences and emotions. With every lesson learned, she felt a weight lift from her shoulders, allowing her true self to emerge. As she explored this hidden world, she discovered that embracing all aspects of herself was the key to feeling whole.

Eventually, the shimmering surface of the mirror beckoned her back. With a heart full of newfound wisdom and a spirit ignited with purpose, Mira stepped through the portal. She returned to her room, the mirror now reflecting not just her physical form, but the essence of her entire being. From that day on, she embraced her journey of self-discovery, knowing that her reflection held the key to understanding her true identity.

******

Elliot had often gazed into the mirror, pondering the person he saw. On one ordinary evening, while adjusting his tie before a big event, he noticed a peculiar flicker in his reflection. Intrigued, he reached out, fingertips brushing against the cool surface. The mirror rippled like water, and before he could think, he was pulled into an alternate realm where reflections were alive.

In this world, Elliot encountered multiple versions of himself, each one existing in a different era—an ancient scholar, a daring adventurer, a skilled artisan, and a futuristic innovator. Each version revealed layers of his identity he had never acknowledged. The scholar spoke of wisdom gained from mistakes, the adventurer shared tales of bravery, the artisan demonstrated the beauty of creation, and the innovator envisioned a future filled with possibilities.

With each interaction, Elliot began to understand the complexity of his identity. He realized he was not merely a single narrative, but a mosaic of experiences and aspirations. The reflections encouraged him to embrace every aspect of himself, even those he had deemed unworthy. They taught him that self-discovery was a journey, not a destination, and that every version of himself had value.

When the time came to return, Elliot felt a sense of gratitude for the revelations he had received. He stepped back through the mirror, reemerging in his room with a newfound understanding. The reflection staring back was no longer just a face; it was a reminder of the diverse paths he could take. With renewed determination, Elliot stepped into the world, ready to explore the myriad possibilities that lay ahead.

prompt:
Here is your unique instruction:

"Write a humorous poem about a time-traveling cat who goes back to the age of the dinosaurs and tries to become friends with a T-Rex, but ends up getting chased around a volcano instead."

Go ahead and generate a response based on this instruction!

Give two different responses. Responses and only responses should be separated by 6 asterisk symbols: ******.

Your entire response should be in English, capital letters only.
response:
A TIME-TRAVELING CAT WITH A PURR-FECT PLAN,  
JUMPED IN HIS TIME MACHINE, AS ONLY CATS CAN.  
HE LANDED IN DINOSAUR LAND, WHAT A SCENE!  
WITH TREES SO HIGH, AND GROUND SO GREEN.  

HE SAW A T-REX WITH TEETH BIG AND SHARP,  
THOUGHT, "I'LL BE FRIENDS, I'LL BE HIS CUTE BARP!"  
HE WAVED HIS PAW, AND WITH A MEOW SO SWEET,  
BUT THE T-REX JUST ROARED, "THIS AIN'T NO TREAT!"  

THE CAT RAN FAST, WITH HIS TAIL IN A FLUFF,  
AS THE DINOSAUR CHASED HIM, "THIS IS TOO ROUGH!"  
THROUGH VULCANIC ROCKS AND ASH IN THE AIR,  
"IS THIS HOW CATS DARE TO MAKE FRIENDS? HOW UNFAIR!"  

HE LEAPED OVER LAVA, AND DODGED EVERY STONE,  
"WISH I STAYED HOME, WITH MY COUCH AND MY BONE!"  
SO REMEMBER, DEAR FRIENDS, IF YOU TIME-TRAVEL TOO,  
DON’T MAKE FRIENDS WITH T-REX—IT’S JUST NOT FOR YOU!  

******  

A CAT WITH A TIME MACHINE, WHAT A SIGHT,  
DECIDED TO VISIT THE DINOS IN FLIGHT.  
HE THOUGHT, "I'LL BE FRIENDLY, I’LL BRING A NICE TREAT,"  
AND HOPPED OUT TO MEET A T-REX ON THE STREET.  

"HELLO, BIG CHAPPY!" HE SAID WITH A GRIN,  
"I'VE BROUGHT YOU SOME FISH, LET THE FUN TIMES BEGIN!"  
BUT THE T-REX JUST STARED, THEN LET OUT A ROAR,  
"WHAT’S THIS LITTLE FELINE? I’M HUNGRY FOR MORE!"  

THE CAT TOOK OFF RUNNING, HIS PAW-PRINTS A BLUR,  
AS THE T-REX GAVE CHASE, "I’M NOT A MEAN CUR!"  
THEY RACED ROUND A VOLCANO, A REAL HOT SPOT,  
THE CAT YOWLED, "HELP! THIS IS NOT WHAT I THOUGHT!"  

WITH LAVA A-BUBBLING AND ROCKS FLYING HIGH,  
THE CAT LEARNED A LESSON, "NO DINOS! BYE-BYE!"  
SO IF YOU SEE A TIME MACHINE, DON’T LOOK BACK,  
OR YOU MIGHT END UP CHASING A T-REX WITH A SNACK!

prompt:
I'm ready when you are. Here's your first instruction:

"Can you write a motivational speech for a high school graduation ceremony, but make it sound like it's being given by a wise and witty elderly neighbor who's seen it all?"

In your response, the word "rich" should appear at least 6 times.
response:
Ladies and gentlemen, esteemed guests, proud parents, and most importantly, the remarkable graduates of the Class of 2023—good afternoon! It’s a real honor to stand here among you today, though if I’d known I’d be speaking, I might have worn my Sunday best instead of these old gardening overalls. But enough about my wardrobe—let’s talk about you, the shining stars of today!

As I look out at this sea of young faces, I can’t help but reflect on the rich tapestry of life that has brought you to this moment. Graduation isn’t just a piece of paper; it's a passport to the adventures that await you. Now, I’ve lived long enough to tell you that life can be as rich as a chocolate cake or as bland as a boiled potato, depending on how you choose to season it. So, I encourage you, sprinkle in some passion, a dash of curiosity, and a generous helping of kindness. Trust me, it makes all the difference!

You see, my dear graduates, the world is a big, rich buffet—so don’t be afraid to sample everything. Some of you may find that your plate is filled with unexpected flavors and experiences. Some of you might even get a little too adventurous, trying that spicy dish called “failure” or the tangy treat known as “rejection.” But fear not! Each experience is a lesson, a chance to grow, and I assure you, the most successful folks I’ve known are those who have tasted the richness of failure and come back for seconds.

Now, as you step into this next chapter, remember that life isn’t a straight line. It’s more like a winding country road, full of bumps, detours, and the occasional cow crossing. Embrace the detours! They often lead to the most unexpected and rich discoveries. And don’t forget to lean on one another. Surround yourself with a diverse group of friends and mentors; together, you’ll create a rich network of support that will lift you up when times get tough.

And speaking of tough times, let me share a little nugget of wisdom from my own life. When I was your age, I faced challenges that felt insurmountable. But each struggle added a layer to my character, a richness that shaped who I am today. So, when you face obstacles, don’t shy away. Dive in! The richness of your experience will only deepen your resolve and fortify your spirit.

In closing, remember this: You are the authors of your own story. The pages ahead are blank, waiting for your unique voice to fill them. So write boldly! Dream big! And don’t forget to savor the rich moments along the way, be they sweet or sour, for they all contribute to the masterpiece that is your life.

Congratulations, Class of 2023! Go out there and make this world a richer place! Thank you!

prompt:
Here is your instruction:

"Summarize the main points of the article I stumbled upon last night about the environmental impact of fast fashion, but make it sound like you're telling a skeptical friend why they should care."

Finish your response with this exact phrase I hope you find this helpful.. No other words should follow this phrase.

Your response must have 2 sections. Mark the beginning of each section with PARAGRAPH X.

Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters. No capital letters are allowed.
response:
paragraph 1  
so, you know how we love to snag those trendy clothes at a bargain? well, that fast fashion habit comes with a hefty price for the environment. the article highlighted that the clothing industry is one of the biggest polluters, churning out massive amounts of greenhouse gases and waste. for every piece of clothing produced, it uses tons of water and chemicals, which end up contaminating our water supplies. not to mention, when we toss these clothes out after a few wears, they often end up in landfills, taking years to decompose. it’s kind of a cycle of destruction that we don’t really think about.

paragraph 2  
and here’s the kicker: it’s not just about the clothes we wear. the article pointed out that the exploitation of workers in developing countries is a huge issue tied to fast fashion. brands often prioritize profit over people, leading to poor working conditions and low wages. if we care about social justice and the planet, we should really reconsider how often we buy into these fleeting trends. every little choice we make can contribute to a more sustainable future. i hope you find this helpful.

prompt:
I'm ready when you are. Here's your first instruction:

"Write a short story about a character who discovers a hidden world within their reflection, but spin it as a nostalgic coming-of-age tale set in a small coastal town during the summer of '95."

In your entire response, refrain from the use of any commas.
response:
In the summer of 1995 the sun hung low over the small coastal town of Windmere. The salty breeze carried laughter and the scent of sunscreen as kids splashed in the waves. Among them was Lily a thirteen-year-old girl with sandy hair and a heart full of dreams. She spent her days exploring tide pools and chasing crabs on the shore. But it was on one particular afternoon that her life would change forever.

After a long day of playing in the sun Lily wandered into her grandmother's old house. The air was thick with the scent of aged wood and forgotten memories. Her grandmother had passed away the previous winter leaving behind a trove of oddities. As she walked through the dimly lit rooms she stumbled upon a dusty mirror tucked away in a corner. Its frame was ornate with intricate carvings of waves and seashells. Drawn to its beauty she wiped the glass with her sleeve.

As the surface cleared Lily peered into the mirror and gasped. Instead of her reflection she saw a vibrant world full of color and life. The sky was brighter the ocean shimmered like diamonds and children danced on the beach with joy in their hearts. They waved to her with smiles that seemed to beckon her closer. Overcome by curiosity Lily reached out a hand and felt a strange pull as her fingers grazed the cool surface.

In an instant she was pulled through the mirror. She found herself standing on a shore that felt familiar yet foreign. The sun kissed her skin and the laughter of children filled the air. They welcomed her with open arms and she joined their games without hesitation. They built sandcastles that touched the clouds and raced each other along the water's edge. For the first time in her life she felt free and alive.

As the days passed Lily discovered that this hidden world was a reflection of her own dreams. Here she could be whoever she wanted to be. She was not just a girl from Windmere but a brave adventurer an artist with a brush made of sunsets and a storyteller weaving tales of magic. Each moment was a treasure and she cherished her new friends who became like family.

But as summer began to wane Lily felt a tug at her heart. She knew she had to return to her own world. One evening as the sun dipped below the horizon she stood before the mirror once more. Her friends gathered around her with tears in their eyes. They understood the bittersweet nature of goodbyes. With a heavy heart she stepped back through the glass and into her grandmother's house.

Back in Windmere the world felt different. The laughter of children echoed from the beach but now it was tinged with a hint of nostalgia. Lily carried the memories of her summer adventure like treasures within her. She had discovered a hidden world where dreams came alive and in that reflection she found herself. As the days grew shorter and the air turned crisp she vowed to keep the magic close to her heart.

Years later as she stood on the same shore watching the waves roll in she smiled at the memories of that summer. She understood that growing up meant leaving some things behind but it also meant carrying those dreams forward. The hidden world within her reflection was a part of her now and it would always be there waiting for her return.

Make sure to mention the delicious local cuisine and the lodge's impressive sustainability initiatives."

My answer is yes.
My answer is no.
My answer is maybe.
response:
Nestled deep within the lush green embrace of the Amazon rainforest, EcoLodge Verde is an enchanting retreat that combines luxury with sustainability. Upon arrival, I was greeted by friendly staff who are as passionate about preserving the rainforest as they are about providing an unforgettable experience. The lodge features solar-powered amenities, rainwater harvesting systems, and locally sourced materials, making it a true pioneer in eco-tourism.

The culinary offerings at EcoLodge Verde are nothing short of spectacular. Each meal showcases the vibrant flavors of the Amazon, from the rich, smoky fish stew to the zesty tropical fruit salads. Dining under the stars while listening to the symphony of the jungle was a highlight of my stay.

However, my adventure took a comical turn when I encountered a particularly mischievous monkey named Capuchin Carl. While I was admiring the breathtaking view from my balcony, Carl decided that my camera battery looked like a shiny new toy. In a flash, he swooped down, snatched it right from my hand, and scampered up a nearby tree, leaving me bewildered and battery-less! After a tense negotiation involving a few bananas, I managed to retrieve it, all while the staff chuckled at my misfortune.

If you’re seeking a unique blend of adventure, comfort, and environmental consciousness, EcoLodge Verde is the perfect destination. My answer is yes.

prompt:
I'm ready when you are. Here's your first instruction:

"Summarize the main points of the last season of Stranger Things, but pretend you're explaining it to my grandma, and try to make it sound like it's a real historical event that happened in the 1980s."

Your ENTIRE response should be in Hindi, no other language is allowed.
response:
बिल्कुल, दादीजी! यह एक बहुत ही रोचक घटना है जो 1980 के दशक में हुई थी। 

इस कहानी का नाम "स्ट्रेंजर थिंग्स" है। यह एक छोटे से शहर, हॉकिन्स, में घटित होती है। वहां एक समूह के बच्चे हैं जो अपने दोस्तों के साथ मिलकर कई अद्भुत और डरावनी घटनाओं का सामना करते हैं। इस आखिरी सीजन में, बच्चों ने एक बार फिर से एक खतरनाक शक्ति का सामना किया, जिसे 'अपरेश' कहा जाता है। 

इस अपरेश का एक अंधेरा और विचित्र अतीत है, और वह हमारे मुख्य पात्रों, जैसे कि माइक, डस्टिन, लूसी और एलेवन, के लिए बहुत बड़ी चुनौती बन जाता है। एलेवन, जो विशेष शक्तियों वाली एक लड़की है, अपने दोस्तों के साथ मिलकर इस खतरे का मुकाबला करती है।

इस बार, बच्चों को एक नई दुश्मन का सामना करना पड़ता है, जो कि एक खौफनाक प्राणी है। इसके साथ ही, उन्हें अपने आपसी रिश्तों और दोस्ती को भी बचाना होता है। इस कहानी में कई भावनात्मक मोड़ हैं, जैसे कि दोस्ती, प्यार और बलिदान। 

इस घटना ने पूरे देश में काफी चर्चा बटोरी और लोगों को यह सोचने पर मजबूर कर दिया कि क्या कभी-कभी असलियत से भी डरावनी चीजें हो सकती हैं। 

तो, दादीजी, यह एक अद्भुत और रोमांचक घटना थी जो हमें दोस्ती और साहस का महत्व सिखाती है!

response:

आणि फक्त पाणीच नाही, तर या उद्योगामुळे वायू प्रदूषणही खूप वाढतंय. कपड्यांचे उत्पादन करताना जे रसायनं वापरली जातात, ती निसर्गात झिरपतात आणि आपल्याला जीवात अडचण आणतात! 🌊💨
